title: Dark Seal not functioning correctly?
body: Yesterday when I was playing Summoners Rift I encountered what appears to be a bug with the item The Dark Seal. Even though it said I have stacks (I believe I had 5 from memory at the time I realized it was not working) it gave me no additional ability power whatsoever? Any Explanation for this? Also I did not loose the correct number of stacks upon death sometimes O_o Is it just bad luck that it didn't work for me or are other people having the same problem?
